template_info.name: Hospital Triage System
template_info.description: Emergency department triage with priority-based treatment for emergency and routine patients
template_info.author: Text2Sim

usage_notes: Models realistic hospital emergency department with priority-based patient flow. Emergency patients receive priority treatment while routine patients are handled during regular hours. Includes realistic service time distributions based on medical literature.
customization_tips: Adjust 'arrival_pattern.distribution' to change overall patient volume (e.g., 'exp(1.5)' for slower, 'exp(4.0)' for busier)
Modify 'entity_types' probabilities to change emergency vs routine patient mix
Scale 'resources' capacities based on department size (more doctors/nurses)
Add 'balking_rules' or 'reneging_rules' for realistic patient abandonment behavior
Extend 'simple_routing' with more complex triage decision logic
Add more entity types (urgent, semi-urgent) with different priority levels
Include additional resources like X-ray, lab equipment, or specialists in routing

examples.description: Reduced patient volume during night hours with higher emergency ratio and no routine doctor
High patient volume crisis requiring additional doctors and higher emergency patient ratio
